alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 11:45AM CDT until April 13 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Stone County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Izard County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Marion County in north central Arkansas... North central Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Fulton County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Baxter County in north central Arkansas... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1145 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Herron, or 14 miles south of Mountain Home, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salem in Fulton County... Calico Rock... Mammoth Spring... Oxford... Norfork... Salesville... Viola... Pineville... Briarcliff... Bexar... Flint Springs... Ott... Sturkie... Wideman... Herron... Byron... Rodney... Advance... Cartney... Culp... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren
